attributes.action: UK must apologise for Balfour Declaration and commit to Mideast peace efforts
attributes.additional_details:
Balfour, a public statement issued by the British government during World War I announcing support for the establishment of a Jewish state in Palestine, has led to mass displacement of the Palestinian nation. November 7 2017 will mark 100 years since Balfour.

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/8e/Balfour_declaration_unmarked.jpg
attributes.background: We call on Her Majesty's government, led by Prime Minister Theresa May, to officially apologise to the Palestinian people for issuing the Balfour Declaration in 1917.
